content: Side note, I suspect we should rename this stream to #wg-async-await
since I think going forward we'l need a place to discuss non-compiler-related things.. but anyway :)

Hey @WG-async-await -- so after last week's more general "foundations" meeting we were thinking it would make sense to "generalize" this stream from just a focus on the implementation to the "async foundation" working group more generally. Therefore, I am going to rename the stream. #wg-async-foundations I guess? I can rename the user group too
I'm not really sure what I think is the best stream naming convention in general .. not sure how I feel about #t-compiler/wg-foo .. but that's a topic for another time I guess.
